Events.OnCreate:
(block ( (playerLevel (korGetPlayerLevel)) dockedFreighters freighterCount qualifyCount gateObj )
(setq dockedFreighters (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "sHZ O:docked; +commonwealth; +freighter;")) (setq freighterCount (count dockedFreighters)) (setq qualifyCount (count (filter dockedFreighters theFreighter (geq playerLevel (objGetStaticData theFreighter "korolovMinLevel")) ) ))
(switch ; Finite number of missions per station (ls (objGetData aOwnerObj 'remainingMissions) 1) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only offer to new pilots and levels 1-3 (not (find '(0 1 2 3) playerLevel)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; No missions once the stronghold is destroyed (objIsAbandoned (objGetObjRefData aOwnerObj 'charonStronghold)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; If we're too close to the gates then no mission (not (setq gateObj (random (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "GR:300; -uncharted;")))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; If there are no freighters we're qualified to escort, or only 1-2 total, then offer mission (or (= qualifyCount 0) (ls freighterCount 2) (and (ls freighterCount 3) (= (random 1 3) 1))) (block (pricePerContainer cargoValue escortRate escortFee escortType)
(setq escortType (random (korFreighterTypes playerLevel))) ; Figure out the price per container of the cargo (This depends on the freighter class) (setq pricePerContainer (eval (typGetStaticData escortType "korolovContainerPrice"))) (if (leq pricePerContainer 0) (setq pricePerContainer 200) )
; Calculate how much cargo freighter can hold (setq cargoValue (* pricePerContainer (/ (typGetProperty escortType 'cargoSpace) 25) ))
; Compute the fee that we will pay for escort based on the value of the ; cargo and the rate that the freighter will pay (setq escortRate (typGetStaticData escortType "korolovEscortRate")) (if (or (not escortRate) (= escortRate 0)) (setq escortRate 100)) (setq escortFee (/ (* escortRate cargoValue) 10000)) (setq escortFee (/ (* escortFee 65) 100)) ; Adjust the fee randomly and round down to the nearest 50 (setq escortFee (intRoundDown (/ (* escortFee (random 75 125)) 100) 50 ) )
; Mission settings (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID gateObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'escortType (random (korFreighterTypes playerLevel))) (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 75) (msnSetData gSource 'pricePerContainer pricePerContainer) (msnSetData gSource 'cargoValue cargoValue) (msnSetData gSource 'reward escortFee) )
; No mission available (msnDestroy gSource) ) )
Events.OnAccepted: (block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (gateTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance gPlayerShip gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) (roll (random 1 100)) ) (switch ; 60% of the time we use the standard Charon transport raid (leq roll 60) (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 1) ; 20% of the time pirates follow the transport through the gate (leq roll 80) (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 2) ; 20% of time there are pirates waiting at the gate (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 3) (objFireEvent gSource 'CreateGatePirates) ) ) (sysAddObjTimerEvent (add gateTime 300) gSource "OnFreighterArrives") )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch ; If we have a freighter ID, then escort it. (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort)
; Otherwise, point to the stargate (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'dock) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed: (switch (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) Nil ; If the ship dies, mission fails (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'playerDestroyedFreighter (and gPlayerShip (= aOrderGiver gPlayerShip))) (msnFailure gSource) ) (= (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'mission) (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (msnIncData gSource 'attackersLeft -1) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (switch ; If a freighter on a mission docked, then mission is successful (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) ) (block Nil (objSetData aObjDocked "korolovPlayerEscort" Nil) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnFreighterArrives:
(block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (destObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) freighterObj cargoValue ) (plyMessage gPlayer "Freighter arrived!")
(setq freighterObj (sysCreateShip (msnGetData gSource 'escortType) gateObj &svCorporate; &evKorolovFreighterBehavior;)) (objSetData freighterObj "korolovPlayerEscort" True) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource freighterObj) (msnSetData gSource 'freighterID (objGetID freighterObj)) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource)
; Load the freighter with cargo (korEmptyFreighter freighterObj) (setq cargoValue (korFillFreighter freighterObj (msnGetData gSource 'pricePerContainer)))
; Add some attackers (switch ; 60% of the time we use the standard Charon transport raid (= (msnGetData gSource 'attackRoll) 1) (block Nil (chrRaidTransport freighterObj destObj gateObj cargoValue) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBeginEscort)) ) ; 20% of the time pirates follow the transport through the gate (= (msnGetData gSource 'attackRoll) 2) (block Nil (sysAddObjTimerEvent 60 gSource 'OnPirateFollow) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgFollowed)) (chrRaidTransport freighterObj destObj gateObj (/ cargoValue 2)) ) ; 20% of time there are pirates waiting at the gate (block Nil (if (= (msnGetData gSource 'attackersLeft) 0) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBeginEscort))) (if (geq (msnGetData gSource 'attackersLeft) 5) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgAmbush))) (objFireEvent gSource 'OrderAttackFreighter) (chrRaidTransport freighterObj destObj gateObj (/ cargoValue 2)) ) ) )
Events.CreateGatePirates: (block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (cargoValue (msnGetData gSource 'cargoValue)) num table ) (switch (leq cargoValue 75000) (setq num (random 4 6)) (leq cargoValue 150000) (setq num (random 5 8)) (leq cargoValue 300000) (setq num (random 6 10)) (leq cargoValue 600000) (setq num (random 7 12)) (setq num (random 8 14)) ) (if (leq cargoValue 250000) (setq table &tbPirateRaider1;) (setq table &tbPirateRaider2;) ) (for i 1 num (block (enemyObj) (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip table gateObj &svPirates;)) (objSetData enemyObj 'mission (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'patrol gateObj 15) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj) (msnIncData gSource 'attackersLeft 1) )) )
Events.OrderAttackFreighter: (block ((freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)))) (enum (filter (sysFindObject gSource "sD:mission;") obj (= (objGetData obj 'mission) (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) ) enemyObj (block Nil (shpCancelOrders enemyObj) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attack freighterObj) ) ) )
